languages.text: "Я — мертва? Так ли это? Я ничем не отличаюсь от тех, кто еще не пересек границу реальности и вечности. Я вижу. Я говорю. Я помню все ваши прегрешения передо мной. И я уже начала воздавать по заслугам тем, кто подвел меня".

"I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."
languages.original_text: "Я — мертва? Так ли это? Я ничем не отличаюсь от тех, кто еще не пересек границу реальности и вечности. Я вижу. Я говорю. Я помню все ваши прегрешения передо мной. И я уже начала воздавать по заслугам тем, кто подвел меня".

traits.locale_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the sins you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the sins you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the sins you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “我死了？我怎么可能死了呢？很多人并没有跨越现实与永恒之间的鸿沟，而我与那些人并没有什么不同。我还能看，还能说话。我还记得你们对我犯下的过错。对于那些辜负了我的人，我已经开始进行报复了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: “我死了？我怎么可能死了呢？很多人并没有跨越现实与永恒之间的鸿沟，而我与那些人并没有什么不同。我还能看，还能说话。我还记得你们对我犯下的罪行。对于那些辜负了我的人，我已经开始进行报复了。”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «¿Que estoy muerta? ¿Cómo? No me diferencio en nada de aquellos que aún no han cruzado la línea que separa la realidad de la eternidad. Veo. Hablo. Recuerdo los crímenes que cometisteis contra mí. Y ya he iniciado mi retribución contra todos aquellos que me fallaron».
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que estoy muerta? ¿Cómo? No me diferencio en nada de aquellos que aún no han cruzado la línea que separa la realidad de la eternidad. Veo. Hablo. Recuerdo los pecados que cometisteis contra mí. Y ya he iniciado mi retribución contra todos aquellos que me fallaron».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「私が死んだ？どのように？私はまだ、現実と永遠の間の分水嶺を越えていない者たちと変わらないわ。私は見る。私は話す。あなたたちが私に対して行った悪事を覚えている。そして、私を裏切った者たちに…すでに報復を始めているのよ」
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「私が死んだ？どのように？私はまだ、現実と永遠の間の分水嶺を越えていない者たちと変わらないわ。私は見る。私は話す。あなたたちが私に対して行った悪事を覚えている。そして、私を裏切った者たちに…すでに報復を始めているのよ」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ich bin tot? Wie das? Ich unterscheide mich nicht von jenen, die die Grenze zwischen Realität und Ewigkeit noch nicht passiert haben. Ich sehe. Ich spreche. Ich erinnere mich an alle eure Vergehen mir gegenüber. Und alle, die mich enttäuscht haben ... wird früher oder später meine Vergeltung treffen."
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin tot? Wie das? Ich unterscheide mich nicht von jenen, die die Grenze zwischen Realität und Ewigkeit noch nicht passiert haben. Ich sehe. Ich spreche. Ich erinnere mich an alle eure Sünden mir gegenüber. Und alle, die mich enttäuscht haben ... wird früher oder später meine Vergeltung treffen."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Morte, moi ? La belle affaire ! Je ne suis pas différente de ceux qui n'ont pas encore franchi le voile séparant la réalité de l'éternité. Je vois comme vous voyez. Je parle comme vous parlez. Je me souviens de tous les préjudices subis au cours de ma vie, et j'ai d'ores et déjà commencé à me venger de ceux qui ont eu l'audace de me trahir. »
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Morte, moi ? La belle affaire ! Je ne suis pas différente de ceux qui n'ont pas encore franchi le voile séparant la réalité de l'éternité. Je vois comme vous voyez. Je parle comme vous parlez. Je me souviens de tous les préjudices subis au cours de ma vie, et j'ai d'ores et déjà commencé à me venger de ceux qui ont eu l'audace de me trahir. »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ölü müyüm? Nasıl yani? Gerçeklik ve ebediyet arasındaki sınırı aşmamış olanlardan farklı değilim ben. Görebiliyorum, konuşabiliyorum. Bana yaptığın tüm yanlışları hatırlıyorum. Beni yüzüstü bırakanlara sesleniyorum: İntikamımı almaya başladım bile."
languages.original_text: "I'm dead? How is that? I am no different from those who have not yet crossed the divide between reality and eternity. I see. I speak. I remember the wrongs you all committed against me. And for all those who failed me — I have already begun exacting my retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Ölü müyüm? Nasıl yani? Gerçeklik ve ebediyet arasındaki sınırı aşmamış olanlardan farklı değilim ben. Görebiliyorum, konuşabiliyorum. Bana yaptığın tüm yanlışları hatırlıyorum. Beni yüzüstü bırakanlara sesleniyorum: İntikamımı almaya başladım bile."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
